metadata.title: CVE-2024-29159 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 through 1.14.3 contains a buffer overflow in H5Z__filter_scaleoffset,resulting in the corruption of the instruction pointer and causing denialof service or potential code execution.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
